subject: Re: QuickScript manual
msgSnippet: ... a ... There s a nice file available in the Shavian Yahoo Group: http://groups.yahoo.com/group/shavian Become a member, go to files, look under fonts and
messageBody:
--- In Read_Alphabet@y..., besdaz@h... wrote:
> Hello--
> Am very excited to have discovered this site just today. I've been a
> so-so reader of Shavian (as in Androcles and the Lion) for many
> years, but am most eager to obtain a copy of Read's QuickScript
> Manual. Can anyone please inform me as to how or where I may obtain
a
> copy. Is it downloadable from anywhere? Or available as a book(let)
> to order? Your assistance will be sincerely appreciated.
> ---Frank

There's a nice file available in the Shavian Yahoo Group:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/shavian

Become a member, go to files, look under fonts and documents. Should
work.

Teraiten.
